title: Father, Awaken Us!
text:
[Benjamin]

Entangle my soul
I’ve watched each turn and every pull
And I still don’t know what to say
No, I still don’t know what to say
Should I watch it break without a single push?
What would you say?
What would you do?

Father, awaken us
Father, awaken us
Father, awaken us
Father, awaken us
